🌵 Streams in the Desert - May 5 🌅

"When they began to sing and praise, the Lord set ambushments... and they were smitten"
(2 Chronicles 20:22) ✝️

🙌 Oh, that we could worry less about our troubles, and sing and praise more! There are many things we see as problems that could become instruments of joy if we knew how to use them.

Some people think deeply about life's difficulties, study God's plans, and wonder why they face so many struggles. 🌈 How much happier they would be if they praised God daily instead of always worrying!

🎵 We can sing our worries away easier than we can think them away.

🌄 Sing in the morning. Birds sing first thing - they live without worry better than any creature I know.

🌇 Sing at evening. Robins sing last thing at night. After their day's work, after their final flight and meal, they perch high up and sing one praise song.

✨ Oh, that we might sing morning and evening, letting songs connect throughout our days!

- Selected

🎶 Don't stop the song in your life
Though sometimes it may flow
In sadder tones; it will change again
To happier ones you know

☁️ Though shadows may darken your skies
And hide the sun awhile,
They'll lift more quick if you let music
Continue through each trial

🎵 Don't stop the song in your life;
Though your voice may lose its strength,
Though notes may fade in your throat,
Keep singing in your soul at length

🌟 Don't stop the song in your life;
Let it echo in your heart;
When you pass away, it will follow
And in heaven take new part
